page.title: 10Shooting Butts Cannock Chase
page.content: Shooting Butts was originally a boarding school, but it is now used as an{Educational Environmental Studies Centre.} It is still at an early stage of development, but it offers a variety of areas of study, such as mature woodland, a deer run, squirrels, insect life, woodland birds etc. There are 2 ponds with man-made islands for nesting ducks. Both ponds are rich in pond life with many different plants, insects and animals. There is a nursery plantation from which schools are supplied with shrubs and trees. The same plantation provided some of the many trees for the centre. The aim is to provide an environment attractive to wildlife while giving children a chance to study nature and to learn to respect it.
